about_the_game:
Dive into the Lowlands Conquest a streamlined RTS experience designed for both newcomers and seasoned strategists. Command your forces, gather resources, and outmaneuver your opponents in this accessible yet challenging real-time strategy game.

Build your base from the ground up, train a diverse army, and engage in epic battles across multiple environments. Whether you're conquering enemy territories or defending your own, every decision matters. Simple controls and intuitive gameplay make it easy to jump right in, but mastering the game requires tactical brilliance.

Level 1 starts slower than other, you have a higher variety of resources and easy camps to raid nearby. Each camp conquered offers reward. Game is designed for different playstyles, you can choose to focus on economy and survive waves of attacks or you can clear nearby camps.

Currently there are 2 tiers of units. Hero unit and market where you can purchase mercenaries will be added within next 2 weeks with a lot of new enemy units that are already in game will be activated.

Dive into the Lowlands Conquest a streamlined RTS experience designed for both newcomers and seasoned strategists. Command your forces, gather resources, and outmaneuver your opponents in this accessible yet challenging real-time strategy game.

Build your base from the ground up, train a diverse army, and engage in epic battles across multiple environments. Whether you're conquering enemy territories or defending your own, every decision matters. Simple controls and intuitive gameplay make it easy to jump right in, but mastering the game requires tactical brilliance.

Level 1 starts slower than other, you have a higher variety of resources and easy camps to raid nearby. Each camp conquered offers reward. Game is designed for different playstyles, you can choose to focus on economy and survive waves of attacks or you can clear nearby camps.

Currently there are 2 tiers of units. Hero unit and market where you can purchase mercenaries will be added within next 2 weeks with a lot of new enemy units that are already in game will be activated.

name: Lowlands Conquest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 7790 - 1gb memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The orc and undead camps are spreading across your land, threatening to overrun everything in their path. As their numbers grow, so does their power. It’s up to you to lead the charge and wipe them out before it's too late.
